mods.abstract: 8; 21; 20.0x40.0; 395; I; 12/03/1847; No markers except one bronze one which lists these:; Burton, Amelia Soule 1807-1892; Conwell, Ira 1818-1878; Conwell, Martha Soule 1821-1895; Soule, Joseph Allen. 1815-1879; Soule, Maria Van Dyke 1804-1847; Soule, Sarah A. 1781-1857
